Concentrate to 1.5 mL volume by ultrafiltration using 10 kDa cut-off spin concentrator at  , aliquot and flash-freeze purified MBP-Clu-tail in liquid nitrogen for storage at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":130,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":214,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2gjsq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c43h8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5sjg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"87shq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1giub","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e47vg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e350m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5h9j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-70","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2rts0","text":"MBP-Clu-tail appears as a double band. In contrast to the lower band, the upper band is sensitive to cleavage by furin, suggesting that a protease from E. coli partially cleaves close to the furin site in MBP-Clu-tail.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"3":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":366,"id":439795,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pprxbixhp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pprvbixhp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pprwbixhp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pprubixhp.webp","width":550}},"4":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":2,"offset":96,"style":"sup"},{"length":2,"offset":101,"style":"sup"},{"length":2,"offset":116,"style":"sup"},{"length":2,"offset":121,"style":"sup"}],"key":"7evpj","text":"Concentrations were determined by absorbance at 280 nm using absorbance coefficients of 66,350 M-1 cm-1 or 1.645 L g-1 cm-1 for MBP-Clu-tail.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8sj9t","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":24},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":44}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":17,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"bs7pq","text":"Approximate yield: From   of culture around   of pure MBP-Clu-tail were obtained.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"neq3","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"},"1":{"data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"}}}}}}
